pos_mean_info_list.mean: 锉磨工人；文件编档员；文件装钉员

word_group.brief_definition: 编入档内；陆续编入；鱼贯而入
文件名称；文件名；文件的名称

bilingual.source: He attached the file to the email.
Have you pressed the button yet to copy the file?
bilingual.target: 你按下按钮复制文件了吗？

bilingual.source: They could read through the 'fact file' so they know how to answer the questions.
bilingual.target: 他们可以阅读“资料文件”，以便知道如何回答问题。

bilingual.source: This software can display the file size of each file.
bilingual.target: 这个软件可以显示每个文件的文件大小。

bilingual.source: The file was copied to a new folder.
bilingual.target: 这个文件被复制到一个新文件夹里。

bilingual.source: This file pocket can hold many documents.
bilingual.target: 这个文件袋可以容纳很多文件。

bilingual.source: Please transfer the file to the new folder.
bilingual.target: 请将文件转存到新的文件夹。

bilingual.source: His file pocket has many categorized folders.
bilingual.target: 他的文件袋里有很多分类文件夹。

bilingual.source: I put all the documents into the file pocket.
bilingual.target: 我把所有的文件都放进了文件袋。

list.abstract: File，英文单词，名词、及物动词、不及物动词，作名词时意为“文件；档案；文件夹；锉刀，人名；(匈、塞)菲莱”，作及物动词时意为“提出；锉；琢磨；把…归档”，作不及物动词时意为“列队行进；用锉刀锉”。
“文件”的意思，Windows中指文件夹下各种类型的数据解压类型的体现形式统称。同时也是IT术语“文件传输协议”、编程语言文件命令的意思。

yingyinNormal.en: The U.N. just received an encrypted audio file. They say it's from the leaders of the Autobots.
yingyinNormal.zh: 联合国刚刚收到一份加密音频文件，说是来自汽车人的领导者。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that doesn't make a difference. No, all you have to do is file the campaign papers. You don't have to actually run.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那也没差别。不，你只需递交参选的文件，不用真的参加竞选。

yingyinNormal.en: I've scoured every single data file on Commander Lewis personal drive. This is officially the least disco song she owns.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我把路易斯指挥官个人硬盘的每一个文件都翻了一遍，这真真儿是她最不迪斯科的歌了。

yingyinNormal.en: I have to check your file. Excuse me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我去查档案，抱歉失陪。

yingyinNormal.en: Now Caseys aren't wealthy, they don't wanna file suit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肖恩家里条件不是很好，他们也不打算提出诉讼。

yingyinNormal.en: Splendid. Clawhauser will give you the complete case file.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好，爪豪斯会把完整的案宗给你。

yingyinNormal.en: File says they volunteered for Strucker's experiments. It's nuts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 资料说他们自愿参加斯特拉克的试验，真是疯了。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't want to look at your file. This is over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没兴趣，到此为止。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't have to decide now. If you look at our file.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不必马上决定，请看看我们的档案。

yingyinNormal.en: This is an extra copy to have on file. You know, just in case.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是用来存档的另一个副本，你知道的，以防万一。

yingyinNormal.en: If you two don't want to be together you'll have to file for divorce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你们不想在一起，就必须办理离婚。

yingyinNormal.en: Ooh, what did I do with my file-a-facts? I must've left it in conference room B.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的名片夹到哪儿去了？一定是忘在B会议室了。

yingyinNormal.en: I need to get my job back! Okay. We'll file a discrimination suit against the NSA.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我得回到原来的工作岗位。好吧，我们会起诉国家安全局歧视员工。

yingyinNormal.en: Crime wave in Gotham. Other breaking news: "Water, wet." Did you file the football yet?
yingyinNormal.zh: 哥谭市暗流涌动，另一条爆炸新闻是“水是湿的”，你写好橄榄球赛的稿子了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe Chase's case file can help clear that up. I'll go down to evidence and take a look.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许切斯的案件卷宗可以帮我们弄清这一点，我去证物科看看。

yingyinNormal.en: File 82-712. Agent Rick Dicker interrogating. State your name, please. Tony. Tony Rydinger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 档案82-712。里克·迪克特工进行讯问。请说出你的名字。托尼，托尼·莱丁杰。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, are you saying that he discriminated against you? Because we should file a complaint.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，你是说他对你有种族歧视？因为我们应该提出控告。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, single file, everybody! Choo choo! Everybody find a safety buddy. My safety buddy is Maya.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了同学们，排成一列，每人找一个安全伙伴，我的安全伙伴是玛雅。

yingyinNormal.en: When you file, I will do just that. Bail is set at $1.3 million, to be posted at a hundred percent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你申请了我再审，保释金为130万，需全额缴纳。

yingyinNormal.en: Will. Will. We sent every file we're legally required to... You're trying to bleed us out of this case.
yingyinNormal.zh: 威尔，威尔。我们已依法将所有卷宗... 你是故意想让我们没任何材料可用。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 档案; 文件(夹); 归档

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: submit a legal document, application, or charge to be placed on record by the appropriate authority

examination_example.sentence: In October the Department of Justice <highlight>filed</highlight> a brief in the Myriad case.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 10月，司法部在Myriad案中提交了一份案情摘要。

examination_example.sentence: Companies are unlikely to <highlight>file</highlight> many more patents for human DNA molecules.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司不太可能为人类DNA分子申请更多的专利。

sense_info_list.zh: 档案; 文件(夹); 归档

word_usage.usage: 熟词僻义：file作动词除了“归档，存档”的意思，还可以表示“提交，提出”，如“file a report提交报告”，“file a complaint提出投诉”。

档案; 归档; 记录

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: submit a legal document, application, or charge to be placed on record by the appropriate authority

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>filed</highlight> a deed protecting the use of his image until 2039, preventing others from recreating him using CGI to appear in a film.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他提交了一份契约，以保护他在2039年之前的肖像使用权，防止其他人用计算机成像技术（CGI）让他在电影中重现。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>File</highlight> a lawsuit against the insurance company.
Almost two decades after Amazon <highlight>filed</highlight> the one-click patent, the online retail shopping and buying experience is filled with frictions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在亚马逊申请一键式专利近20年后，在线零售购物和购买体验充满了摩擦。

sense_info_list.en: a set of related data that has its own name

examination_example.sentence: Making the effort to organize and label <highlight>files</highlight> so others can understand them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 努力去组织和标记文件使其他人可以理解。

examination_example.sentence: So I quickly designed a skirt on my computer, and I loaded the <highlight>file</highlight> on the printer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以我很快在电脑上设计了一条裙子，然后把文件传到打印机上。

sense_info_list.en: a folder or box for holding loose papers that are typically arranged in a particular order for easy reference
sense_info_list.zh: 文件夹; 文件柜; 文件箱
档案; 归档; 记录
